alerts.title: Attention Required
alerts.phWarning: pH levels are approaching warning threshold in Tank #3. Consider maintenance check.

totalNitrogen.name: Total Nitrogen
totalNitrogen.description: Evaluates total nitrogen content, an important indicator of water eutrophication.

totalPhosphorus.name: Total Phosphorus
totalPhosphorus.description: Evaluates total phosphorus content, a key element causing water eutrophication.

ammoniaNitrogen.name: Ammonia Nitrogen
ammoniaNitrogen.description: Indicates organic pollution decomposition or discharge.

nitrate.name: Nitrate
nitrate.description: Reflects nitrate nitrogen concentration from nitrogen compound oxidation.

nitrite.name: Nitrite
nitrite.description: Indicates nitrite nitrogen content, high levels are toxic to aquatic life.

phosphate.name: Phosphate
phosphate.description: Reflects phosphate concentration, usually from domestic and agricultural wastewater.

sulfate.name: Sulfate
sulfate.description: Sulfate concentration can indicate mineral dissolution or industrial discharge.

dissolvedOrganicCarbon.name: Dissolved Organic Carbon
dissolvedOrganicCarbon.description: Important indicator of dissolved organic matter content in water.

totalCarbon.name: Total Carbon
totalCarbon.description: Represents the total carbon content in water.

inorganicCarbon.name: Inorganic Carbon
inorganicCarbon.description: Usually related to carbonates and bicarbonates.

totalOrganicCarbon.name: Total Organic Carbon
totalOrganicCarbon.description: Indicates total organic pollution in water.

chemicalOxygenDemand.name: Chemical Oxygen Demand
chemicalOxygenDemand.description: Indicates the amount of oxygen consumed by oxidation of reducing substances in water.

totalHardness.name: Total Hardness
totalHardness.description: Comprehensive indicator of calcium, magnesium and other ion content in water.

residualChlorine.name: Residual Chlorine
residualChlorine.description: Residual chlorine concentration, can indicate disinfection effectiveness.

fluoride.name: Fluoride
fluoride.description: Fluoride content in water, closely related to drinking water safety.

sulfide.name: Sulfide
sulfide.description: Evaluates sulfide concentration, high levels can cause oxygen depletion and toxicity.

chloride.name: Chloride
chloride.description: Reflects chloride ion concentration in water.

phenols.name: Phenols
phenols.description: Common organic pollutants in industrial wastewater.

methanol.name: Methanol
methanol.description: Methanol content in water, can indicate industrial pollution.

potassium.name: Potassium
potassium.description: Potassium ion concentration, used to analyze mineral composition of water.

resistivity.name: Resistivity
resistivity.description: Water resistivity, reflects its conductivity, related to dissolved solids concentration.

salinity.name: Salinity
salinity.description: Evaluates water salinity, reflects total mineral content.

zinc.name: Zinc
zinc.description: Evaluates zinc ion content in water.

cadmium.name: Cadmium
cadmium.description: Cadmium content in water, high levels are toxic to humans and organisms.

copper.name: Copper
copper.description: Evaluates copper ion content in water.

manganese.name: Manganese
manganese.description: Manganese content in water, high levels affect drinking water taste and health.

aluminum.name: Aluminum
aluminum.description: Aluminum concentration, high levels may affect human health and industrial water quality.

iron.name: Iron
iron.description: Iron concentration, closely related to water color and taste.

chromium.name: Hexavalent Chromium
chromium.description: Hexavalent chromium concentration, can indicate industrial pollution, toxic.

ferrousIron.name: Ferrous Iron
ferrousIron.description: Ferrous iron content, indicates whether oxidation-reduction reactions occur in water.

arsenic.name: Arsenic
arsenic.description: Arsenic content, can indicate geological or industrial pollution, toxic.

siliconDioxide.name: Silicon Dioxide
siliconDioxide.description: Reflects silicon dioxide concentration, used to analyze minerals in water.

solubleSilicon.name: Soluble Silicon
solubleSilicon.description: Soluble silicon, used to evaluate silicon element activity in water.

turbidity.name: Turbidity
turbidity.description: Indicates suspended particle content in water.

chlorophyll.name: Chlorophyll
chlorophyll.description: Reflects phytoplankton biomass in water, an important indicator of water eutrophication.

dissolvedOxygen.name: Dissolved Oxygen
dissolvedOxygen.description: Indicates oxygen supply level in water.

totalDissolvedSolids.name: Total Dissolved Solids
totalDissolvedSolids.description: Total dissolved solids, reflects total amount of dissolved substances in water.

actions.configureDescription: Select parameters to monitor and configure their thresholds.

physical.name: Physical Parameters
physical.description: Includes physical characteristics such as pH, turbidity, and conductivity.

organic.name: Organic Parameters
organic.description: Includes organic content indicators such as total nitrogen, total phosphorus, and ammonia nitrogen.

metals.name: Metal Ions
metals.description: Includes heavy metal ion content indicators such as zinc and copper.

toxins.name: Toxic Substances
toxins.description: Includes toxic and harmful substance indicators such as phenols.

ions.name: Ionic Components
ions.description: Includes ion content indicators such as total hardness and chloride.

biological.name: Biological Indicators
biological.description: Includes biological activity indicators such as chlorophyll.
